name: Dragon Ball Z (JAKKS Pacific TV Game)
description: Plug It In & Play TV Games: Dragon Ball Z (informally known as "Dragon Ball Z TV game" or "Dragon Ball Z 3-in-1") is a self-contained gaming system which hooks up to a television set via audio-video cables and contains three games. It was developed in 2006 by Handheld Games LLC and published by JAKKS Pacific, Inc. of Malibu, California.
